price: ئەمجا بۆیان دەرکەوت و پێیان چاک بوو پاش ئەوەی ئەو ھەموو بەڵگەیان (لێ) بینی تاماوەیەک بەندی بکەن
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
